mapper.insert: insert into activityrecommend (reId, activityId, branchId, websiteType, activityTypeFatherId) values (#{reid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{websitetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activitytypefatherid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into activityrecommend
reId,
activityId,
branchId,
websiteType,
activityTypeFatherId,

mapper.update:
update activityrecommend
activityId = #{activityid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchId = #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
websiteType = #{websitetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activityTypeFatherId = #{activitytypefatherid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where reId = #{reid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT c.*,a.*,c.activityName,c.registeryfee from activityrecommend a,employee e,branch b,activity c where e.employeeId = b.employeeId and b.branchId = a.branchId and a.activityId = c.activityId and a.websiteType = '分店官网(教育)' and e.employeeId = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT c.*,a.*,c.activityName,c.registeryfee from activityrecommend a,employee e,branch b,activity c where e.employeeId = b.employeeId and b.branchId = a.branchId and a.activityId = c.activityId and a.activityTypeFatherId = 1 and e.employeeId = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT c.*,a.*,c.activityName,c.registeryfee from activityrecommend a,employee e,branch b,activity c where e.employeeId = b.employeeId and b.branchId = a.branchId and a.activityId = c.activityId and a.activityTypeFatherId = 2 and e.employeeId = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from employee e,branch b,activityrecommend a where e.employeeId = b.employeeId and b.branchId = a.branchId and e.employeeId = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(*) from employee e,branch b,activityrecommend a where e.employeeId = b.employeeId and b.branchId = a.branchId and a.activityTypeFatherid = 1 and e.employeeId = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(*) from employee e,branch b,activityrecommend a where e.employeeId = b.employeeId and b.branchId = a.branchId and a.activityTypeFatherid = 2 and e.employeeId = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
